p: Here, we measured the IC 50 of oseltamivir ethoxysuccinate that is necessary to reduce the NA activity of the B/2017 and B/2017-MA strains ( Table 1). Thus, analysis of the NA inhibition in vitro showed that oseltamivir ethoxysuccinate and Tamiflu Â® reduced the neuraminidase activity of the B/2017 and B/2017-MA strains equally effectively.
